title: Bobby Shares An Update On Amy's Return + Raymundo Gets 'Bro-Tox' + ‘Joy Or Fear' Scream Game!?
itunes:title: Bobby Shares An Update On Amy's Return + Raymundo Gets 'Bro-Tox' + ‘Joy Or Fear' Scream Game!?
description:
Bobby gives an update on Amy after her father passed away last week and she hasn’t been in. He updates us on when she will return. Raymundo tells us about the process of getting shots of botox in his face. Bobby and Eddie play a game where they try to decide if a person is screaming from Joy or Fear.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
